      • scrubClass

        protected void scrubClass(java.lang.Class<?> testCaseClass)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Overrides AndroidTestCase.scrubClass(Class) because current implementation has a bug, it uses getClass() instead of the testCaseClass argument. So when a test case class extends from another test class, only the fields of subclass is scrubbed.
        Overrides:
        scrubClass in class android.test.AndroidTestCase
        Parameters:
        testCaseClass -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
